description: Try our easy to follow Egg & Beetroot Rice Paper Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rice paper rolls,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Budget,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Quick & easy lunch,Beetroot,Peanut free
name: Egg & Beetroot Rice Paper Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk yoghurt, mustard and chives in a bowl and season with pepper. Set half aside for dipping. Mix remaining sauce with cooked quinoa and hard-boiled eggs.
Combine carrot with cabbage and toss with apple cider vinegar. Slice beetroot into julienne.

Using rice paper wrappers, soak one at a time in warm water for 30 seconds and then place on a damp tea towel. Place an 1/8 ingredients into each wrap and roll tightly. Repeat and serve with remaining dipping sauce.
